page.title: 02A Child's Life in Stithians
page.content: I am a nine year old boy. I live in a two story detatched house which is over one hundred years old.For breakfast I normally have a bowl of Alpen cereal, an egg and a cup of coffee. My sister and I both go to {Stithians School,}the only one in the village. One of my parents drives us to school in our fairly new estate car. I have school dinners which are OK! as long as they don't have melted cheese on. After school I like to program my Electron computer or ride my bike. If I want to see my friends I have to cycle but I hate riding back because it's all up hill. I watch a lot of television and my favourite programs are action adventures like "The A Team". I go to bed about 8:30 and read fact books until my arms get tired and I fall asleep.
